column2:
"I'd say that was good enough. This boot camp
is now complete, and you have passed with
flying colors."

"You may not be able to feel it yet,
but I'm certain your real ability has grown.
I guarantee that."

"Now then, until the next boot camp...
I'll be looking forward to it."

"はい、いいでしょう。
今回の特訓はここまで。
もちろん課題はクリア。"

"まだ実感できないかもしれないけれど
貴方の実力は確実に増しているわ。
私が保証します。"

"それじゃ、次の特訓も
期待しておいてね。"
